Celebrate the month of November in style with many attractive offers specially crafted to make this season truly exceptional.

With many attractive offers from Luxury Staycation to Exquisite Menus, Extensive wines and Champagne selections, all are waiting to bring you the loveful moments in the Heart of Saigon. We will look forward to creating, yet again, more memorable experiences…. See you soon!
